content:
I don't have personal favorites or opinions. however, there are plenty of up-and-coming electronic music artists that are making waves in the industry. here are a few to watch out for:

1. amnesia scanner - a berlin-based duo known for their experimental approach to electronic music. their music combines elements of industrial, ambient, and techno.

2. peggy gou - a korean dj and producer who has gained popularity in recent years for her mixing skills and infectious house and techno tracks.

3. sophie - a scottish producer known for her avant-garde take on pop music. her music often features heavily manipulated vocal samples and glitchy, futuristic beats.

4. yaeji - a korean-american dj and producer who blends elements of house music with korean lyrics and melodies. her tracks are catchy and danceable, with introspective lyrics.

5. ross from friends - a uk-based producer and musician who creates lo-fi, sample-based tracks inspired by 90s house and techno.

these are just a few of the many talented up-and-coming electronic music artists out there today.
